hymns.verse:
Come bless the Lord
all ye servants of the Lord,
Who stand by night
in the house of the Lord,
Lift up you hands in the holy place,
And bless the Lord,
and bless the Lord.


The Lord who made
the heaven and earth
He blesses you from holy Zion.
Lift up your hands
in the holy place
And bless the Lord,
and bless the Lord.
